segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the other side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a boy on a stool, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like he's trying to get cookies from a jar labeled 'COOKIE JAR.'
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool underneath him appears incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed, and it's leaning precariously backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a surge of fear watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, perhaps to catch the treats or as a makeshift lid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His younger sister is standing nearby, hand outstretched, clearly complicit in this cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their task, completely unaware of the impending fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish I could warn them about the tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a very risky maneuver they're attempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem so happy in their little conspiracy, though.
segments.speaker: PAR
